body: I never thought I was going to see a e-girl in a BnH doujinshi lol, this girl was hot back then a 10/10 she still has a great body but lately she's looking more goth trashy and not in a good way, dunno why some hot girls do that when they hit 30 the smart ones accept their age and settle for a mature still sexy look or like this one become really gross old cougars that don't want to stop being hot teens
Mineta may be weird little pervert, but his small size is oddly satisfying in doujins
@dapsmacks43 And characters like Bakago are good. Bruh
why the fuck is there swimsuit succubus
BnHA needs more Mineta and less Deku in its doujin. I mean every doujin should give the joke character some love (and pussy) instead of MC the better.
Swimsuit Succubus x Mineta is the best ship in MHA

@Ill Be Your Daddy except those characters were at least kinda useful and had some level of bearing on the plot. whereas mineta is literally just there to take up space on the page.

@hakumen no mono he's far from good.
@dapsmack he's a perverted character thats his punchline and he's not that bad tbh

He's like Master Roshi or Jiraiya & he can turn the pervert switch off at times, His fight with Midnight is the biggest example of that. More importantly, he's smart too considering the fact that he came 9th in the written exam out of the Top 10.
Omg what the actual fuck, Mineta?!  XD
That's probably the most ingenious use of Minetas' quirk for him to have sex despite how he's a midget.

@qwerqwetsadafcw yikes.

@hakumen no mono "what's wrong with mineta?" you mean outside of the fact that he's quite possibly the worst character in the series, more of a joke than an actual character. and an unfunny one at that.
this is fucking weird
@dapsmack43 whats wrong with mineta doe he's literally the perverted character why wouldn't he have hentai i mean he does but not yaoi
@dapsmack43 of course she likes Mineta. How could she say that she doesn't like a character that's basically a collective image of people who are paying for her nudes.
@dapsmack also since when is just underssing called cosplaying? She's just a whore like all those "camgirls" and "models".
@hakumen no mono do they usually involve Mineta?
I'm so proud right now, lmao. My friend has a doujinshi.
Why don't i see these reactions with mha yaoi?
people actually pay sss for her nudeless pics? wow.
Actual Mineta fans? Never thought I'd see the day.
He's finally get the respect he deserves *cries*

Fck you meneta.  The girl is not bad tho but I don't know she in the anime or not.
